_sText:
This is a basic gg map. It includes 32 spawnpoints and a 3d skybox. The map has 3 levels. The upper level is accessible by teleportation. 

This is my second map. I'm taking baby steps...slowly turning through the hammer learning curve.

The Lego textures used here were from the LetGo texture pack designed by BerneyBoy. I just converted them to .vtf and .vmt files to use on hammer.
